short_description: cobli is a blinds, curtains & draperies supplier based in harelbeke, belgium.
long_description: gegarandeerd de laagste prijzen van de benelux 5 jaar garantie. bij cobli hebben we meer dan 40 jaar ervaring in zonwering en raamdecoratie. we kennen de markt door en door en weten daarom precies wat jij wilt. en daar stemden we onze collecties, met alle soorten raamdecoratie, op af. al onze producten zijn van hoge kwaliteit, op maat gemaakt, tijdloos, trendy en vooral betaalbaar. het online bestellen van raamdecoratie is nog niet zo ingeburgerd.
business_tags: venetian blinds | black / gray | aluminum blinds | blackout blinds | roller blinds | blackout curtain | velux roof windows
generated_description: cobli is a company with over 40 years of experience in sun protection and window decoration. they offer a wide range of high-quality and affordable window decorations, including roller blinds, pleated blinds and shutters, pvc shutters and blinds in various colors such as white, beige, gray/silver, brown, red, orange, purple, green, yellow/gold, blue, black, and wood. cobli provides measuring instructions to help customers determine the right window decoration for their specific needs. they also offer a 5-year warranty on all their products. cobly's collections include popular types of window decorations such as roller blind, pleate curtains, and pvc shutter blinds. customers can easily order online and receive free color stones to ensure the quality of their products and colors.
